reviewText: If you love Harness Horse Racing and Will Rogers you'll enjoy this movie!
I watched this movie as a youngster about 50 years ago and it still works just fine.  Will Rogers never gets old.  Tra Ra Ra Boom te a

I had been looking for this movie for years.  And suddenly here it was--available on Amazon.  Yippee!  David Harum has always been one of my favorite books--read it first as a teenager and I loved the movie but it was only a memory until it was offered by Amazon.  It is great to be able to get these classic films.  Many thanks.
